Body:
""" Test that df.columns can be passed into __init__ """
ndarr = np.array([[1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 1], [6, 5, 4, 3, 8, 1, 2], [1, 1, 9, 1,
    1, 1, 3], [9, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 4], [3, 3, 3, 9, 3, 3, 5], [1, 2, 2, 9, 1,
    4, 6]])
exp_driver_score = np.array([0.14721, 0.44398, 0.23979, 0.62493, 0.71898, 
    0.31662])
df = pd.DataFrame(ndarr)
df.columns = ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g']
driver_score = Kruskals.Kruskals(ndarr, exp_driver_score, i_vars=df.columns
    ).driver_score_to_series()
assert np.array_equal(driver_score.index.values, ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e',
    'f', 'g'])
